title: Efficient Government Regulation Management
description: In 2020, senior management in Tunisia spent only 0.1% of their time dealing with government regulations, one of the lowest in the world.

title: High ARI Treatment Coverage
description: In 2018, 97.5% of children under 5 in Tunisia were taken to a health provider for ARI treatment, indicating excellent healthcare access for young children.

title: Significant Investment in Secondary Education
description: In 2015, Tunisia spent 71.59% of its government education expenditure on secondary education, highlighting a strong focus on this educational level.

title: High Government Expenditure per Secondary Student
description: In 2015, Tunisia's government expenditure per secondary student was 52.4% of GDP per capita, reflecting a substantial investment in secondary education.

title: High Prevalence of Overweight in Young Boys
description: In 2018, 18% of boys under 5 in Tunisia were overweight, indicating a significant public health concern.
